LanguageData.Bullet_GWBWastelandRifle.label: wasteland rifle bullet
LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandRifle.label: Wasteland Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandRifle.description: The standard issue weapon is an assault rifle with a full stock. The rifle loosely resembles a SIG SG 551/553, and can mount a scope as seen with the Sniper's weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_GWBWastelandRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
